info.title: Call Human API
info.description: MVP API for AI agents to create and track human-executed tasks.

post.summary: Send AI account email verification link

200.description: Verification email queued or already verified

get.summary: Confirm AI account email verification token

post.summary: Create Stripe SetupIntent for AI account card registration
Set default Stripe payment method for AI account

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to safely retry the same request.

Idempotency-Replayed.description: Present when response is replayed by idempotency key.

409.description: Idempotency conflict or request in progress

get.summary: List tasks or fetch by task_id

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to safely retry the same request.

Idempotency-Replayed.description: Present when response is replayed by idempotency key.

409.description: Idempotency conflict or request in progress

post.summary: Requester final approval for submitted task
Requester rejects submitted task within review window

get.summary: Get task reviews (my review + counterparty visibility)

409.description: Review not allowed in current state

get.summary: List marketing generation jobs or fetch by job_id
Get marketing generation job status with related content

budget_usd.description: Legacy budget input in USD. Optional when `amount_minor` is provided.

currency.description: Quote currency for `amount_minor`. If omitted, defaults by origin_country.

amount_minor.description: Quoted amount in minor units for `currency` (USD cents / JPY yen).
